deltas.value_before: Stage 1: 15 Nm, Stage 2: 65 Nm, then 180° angular tightening
deltas.value_after: Stage 1: 20 Nm, Stage 2: 70 Nm, then 180° angular tightening
All M12 cylinder head bolts are torque-to-yield (TTY) type and must be replaced after removal. Reuse of bolts may result in insufficient clamping force and catastrophic engine failure.
6.8 liters including filter
SAE 5W-30 API SP/CF or equivalent (API SP required for warranty compliance)

deltas.value_before: Inspect timing belt for cracks and wear at 60,000 miles. Replace if any damage found or at 100,000 miles maximum.

deltas.value_after: 2022 models use timing chain system. Chain requires no routine maintenance. Inspect only if noise, rattling, or performance issues develop. Chain replacement typically not required before 200,000 miles under normal use.
Normal operating temperature: 90-98°C (194-208°F)

deltas.value_before: Located under driver side dashboard, left of steering column, behind trim panel
deltas.value_after: Located under driver side dashboard, directly above brake pedal assembly (no trim removal required)

deltas.value_before: Fuel rail pressure: 350-380 bar (5076-5511 psi) at idle
deltas.value_after: Fuel rail pressure: 360-400 bar (5221-5801 psi) at idle

deltas.value_before: Maximum boost: 1.8 bar (26.1 psi) at full load
deltas.value_after: Maximum boost: 2.0 bar (29.0 psi) at full load (increased performance map)
ZF Lifeguard 8+ (Part No: ZF-LG8-PLUS-002) - Improved thermal stability

deltas.value_before: Active regeneration triggers every 250-350 miles depending on driving conditions
deltas.value_after: Active regeneration triggers every 350-500 miles with improved DPF catalyst formulation
AdBlue tank capacity: 24 liters. System requires minimum 2.5 liters to restart after empty. Refill warning at 2400 km (1500 mi) remaining range.
Enhanced AGM 12V 95Ah (DIN: H8 950A) for improved stop-start performance
NGK ILKAR7B11G (Iridium, gap: 1.0mm) - Updated for improved combustion
Replace every 100,000 miles or 6 years (improved belt material)
Replace every 20,000 miles or annually (high-efficiency filter media)

New procedure: EGR cooler should be inspected and cleaned every 50,000 miles on diesel engines. Use approved cleaning solution (Part No: JLR-EGR-CLEAN-01). Failure to maintain may cause restricted exhaust flow and reduced performance.
Special tool required: JLR-308-1654 rear main seal installer. DO NOT attempt installation without proper tooling as seal damage may occur.
Use timing pins: JLR-303-1552A (crankshaft), JLR-303-1553A (camshaft) - Updated pin design for improved accuracy

deltas.value_before: Replace fuel filter cartridge every 20,000 miles. Prime system after replacement.
deltas.value_after: Replace fuel filter cartridge every 30,000 miles. New self-priming design eliminates manual priming step.

deltas.value_before: DOT 4 LV (Low Viscosity) brake fluid only
deltas.value_after: DOT 5.1 brake fluid (improved boiling point: 260°C dry, 180°C wet)
Shell TF 0870 (1.4 liters capacity) - Improved low-temperature performance

deltas.value_before: Front & rear differentials: Change oil every 50,000 miles
deltas.value_after: Front & rear differentials: Change oil every 75,000 miles (synthetic oil upgrade)
2022 models feature upgraded air suspension compressor relay (Part No: LR123456) with improved thermal protection. Prevents compressor failure in extreme operating conditions.
